member.name: M:HRISv2.HRISLibrary.Database.Open(System.String,HRISv2.HRISLibrary.Declares.PreferedDbType)
member.summary: Opens a connection between application and supported databases.
member.param: (String) Connection parameter. See database documentation for reference.
(Database Type) Supported database includes MSSQL, MYSQL and Oracle(soon).

member.name: M:HRISv2.HRISLibrary.Database.LogAudit(System.Object,HRISv2.HRISLibrary.Declares.PreferedDbType,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Object@)
member.param: (Connection Object) Currently used active connection object.
(Object) Supported database includes MSSQL, MYSQL and Oracle(soon).
(Integer) Transaction Types for Audit logs. Possible values : 0- Insert, 1- Retrieve.
(Integer) Log/Activity Source. Possible values : 0- Application, 1- Query Command, 2- Exception.
member.remarks: Created by Romel S. Dela Cruz on June 5, 2016
